content: I've been thinking about how to incorporate the poem into my story, and I think I might use it as a way to reveal more about my protagonist's backstory and emotional journey. The poem is about the changing seasons, but it's also about the cyclical nature of life, death, and rebirth - themes that are really relevant to my story. I'm thinking of using the poem as a sort of refrain, scattered throughout the narrative to mark key moments of transformation and growth for my protagonist. What do you think?
